issue.title: [CF 1211] Show arena dampening value.
issue.body:
What dogtag should i use, to show value of arena dampening debuff in icon?


> Posted by CurseForge user Hearthstonemakesmemad | Imported from CurseForge issue #1211 | Raw

comments.body:
Use the Aura Variables setting on the icon. The percentage will be reported through the [Stacks] tag.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

what is the aura variables setting?


> Posted by CurseForge user Talason84891
